title: New system
body: When will riot make a system where we aren't punished in losing lp for people going afk mid game

replies.body: ew all you play is yasuo and kat I genuinely feel sorry for you

Rather than that, 
I would rather see , 

1) First AFK mid game  , 30 minute que 30LP loss.
2) Second AFK mid game, 3 days Ban 30LP loss. 
3) Third AFK mid game (within a week after 3 day ban), 2 weeks Ban 30LP loss.
4) Fourth AFK mid game (within a week after 2 week ban), Permanent Ban.

I mean, with that logic:
When will they make a system where we aren't rewarded when the 16/2 Vayne carries our feeding asses to victory?

Careful what you wish for, there are two sides to every coin remember.
Rather say gg and accept a team dif than someone going afk at 25 minutes every 2 games you're not wrong though
rather have an afk then a 0/10
and im talking about people who are doing fine and playing the game not 0/10
